summary:
I am developing environmentally friendly and highly productive marine seismic sources: marine vibrators. Actively contributing to the advancement of its novel acquisition and processing techniques.

I have expertise in geophysics research and software development for marine seismic data processing, inversion, and imaging. My PhD thesis was about seismic multiples (signal noise), and I passionately propose using them!

I strongly advocate open and ethical scientific communication, actively contributing to international conferences and workshops. I firmly believe in the power of collaboration in a team and thrive in diverse and multicultural environments.

Always up for a chat about exciting developments in the sustainable transition sphere!
